messages.message:
Direct Hire - Sr. Devops Engineer - Phoenix, AZ

Dear Brian, 

I wanted to connect with you in regards to a direct hire opportunity for a Sr. DevOps Engineer in the Phoenix area with an excellent pay rate and benefits. Please let me know if you know of anyone that comes from a background working as a DevOps Engineer with strong Cloud experience, and a background in automation experience within Puppet, Chef, or Salt. 

If you are interested, or know someone that would be, it would be great to grab an updated resume as well!

Thanks for your time

Geordie Dye
Professional Recruiter at Apex Systems
480-368-2480 | gdye@apexsystemsinc.com
